itunes:title: Advent Week 5 with Beth & Matt Redman
title: Advent Week 5 with Beth & Matt Redman
description:
It’s the final week of Advent and the brink of a new year! Raechel and Amanda, along with singer-songwriter duo Beth and Matt Redman, wrap up the narratives surrounding Jesus’s first advent. They then contemplate what it means to faithfully live between the two advents. Join them as they reflect on the hope, joy, and comfort that the everlasting Light brings in this period of waiting for His return.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Title Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/advent-week-5-with-beth-matt-redman
